1.name: The Godfather
1.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

2.name: Deliverance
2.description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

3.name: Solaris
3.description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

4.name: Cabaret
4.description: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

5.name: Ultimo tango a Parigi
5.description: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

6.name: The Last House on the Left
6.description: Two teenage girls head to a rock concert for one's birthday. While trying to score marijuana in the city, they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts.

7.name: The Poseidon Adventure
7.description: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

8.name: Dracula A.D. 1972
8.description: Johnny Alucard raises Count Dracula from the dead in London in 1972. The Count goes after the descendants of Van Helsing.

9.name: Pink Flamingos
9.description: Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Divine goes up against a sleazy married couple who make a passionate attempt to humiliate her and seize her tabloid-given title as "The Filthiest Person Alive".

10.name: Jeremiah Johnson
10.description: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe, and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

11.name: Boxcar Bertha
11.description: During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on the management of a railroad.

12.name: Meng long guo jiang
12.description: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

13.name: The Getaway
13.description: A recently released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

14.name: Slaughterhouse-Five
14.description: A man named Billy Pilgrim tells the story of how he became unstuck in time and was abducted by aliens.

15.name: Frenzy
15.description: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

16.name: Aguirre, der Zorn Gottes
16.description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

17.name: Fritz the Cat
17.description: A hypocritical swinging college student cat raises hell in a satiric vision of various elements on the 1960s.

18.name: Sweet Sugar
18.description: Prostitute Sugar is set up by a corrupt politician. She is convinced of the futility of appealing her case in the courts and signs on to a chain gang run by the notorious Dr. John who ...                See full summary »

19.name: Silent Running
19.description: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.

20.name: Tales from the Crypt
20.description: Five strangers get lost in a crypt and, after meeting the mysterious Crypt Keeper, receive visions of how they will die.

21.name: Jing wu men
21.description: A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.

22.name: The Cowboys
22.description: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.

23.name: Sleuth
23.description: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

24.name: What's Up, Doc?
24.description: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

25.name: Viskningar och rop
25.description: When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

26.name: Joe Kidd
26.description: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

27.name: The Big Bird Cage
27.description: Grier and Haig are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.

28.name: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
28.description: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his brand of justice as he sees fit.

29.name: Sisters
29.description: A fledgling Staten Island journalist witnesses a brutal murder in the neighboring apartment of a French-Canadian model, but the police do not believe that the crime took place. With the help of a private detective, she seeks out the truth.

30.name: The Mechanic
30.description: An aging hitman befriends a young man who wants to be a professional killer. Eventually it becomes clear that someone has betrayed them.

31.name: Pánico en el Transiberiano
31.description: In 1906, in China, a British anthropologist discovers a frozen prehistoric creature and must transport it to Europe by train.

32.name: Roma
32.description: A fluid, unconnected and sometimes chaotic procession of scenes detailing the various people and events of life in Italy's capital, most of it based on director Federico Fellini's life.

33.name: Vampire Circus
33.description: As the plague sweeps the countryside, a quarantined village is visited by a mysterious traveling circus. Soon, young children begin to disappear, and the locals suspect the circus troupe might be hiding a horrifying secret.

34.name: Frogs
34.description: A group of helpless victims celebrate a birthday on an island estate crawling with killer amphibians, birds, insects, and reptiles.

35.name: Le charme discret de la bourgeoisie
35.description: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

36.name: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask
36.description: Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.

37.name: Uçan Kiz
37.description: The adventures of a Turkish female superhero that can fly.

38.name: Non si sevizia un paperino
38.description: A reporter and a promiscuous young woman try to solve a series of child killings in a remote southern Italian town rife with superstition and a distrust of outsiders.

39.name: I racconti di Canterbury
39.description: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.

40.name: Asylum
40.description: In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

41.name: Cosa avete fatto a Solange?
41.description: In London, the Italian gym teacher Enrico 'Henry' Rosseni is having a love affair with his eighteen year-old student Elizabeth, who is the niece of the owner of the Catholic school where he...                See full summary »

42.name: The Heartbreak Kid
42.description: A newlywed man on his honeymoon has second thoughts about his marriage and falls for a different woman.

43.description: A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

44.name: Tutti i colori del buio
44.description: A woman recovering from a car accident in which she lost her unborn child finds herself pursued by a coven of devil worshipers.

45.name: Brother Sun, Sister Moon
45.description: This is a dramatization of events in the life of St. Francis of Assisi from before his conversion experience through his audience with the pope, including his friendship with St. Clare.

46.name: Perché quelle strane gocce di sangue sul corpo di Jennifer?
46.description: Having recently escaped the clutches of a hippie sex cult, a beautiful model is pursued by a serial killer whose previous victims include former occupants of her new apartment.

47.name: Man of La Mancha
47.description: The funny story of mad but kind and chivalrous elderly nobleman Don Quixote who, aided by his squire Sancho Panza, fights windmills that are seen as dragons to save prostitute Dulcinea who is seen as a noblewoman.

48.name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
48.description: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

49.name: Private Parts
49.description: Young Cheryl moves into her estranged aunt Martha's rundown King Edward Hotel. One of its offbeat residents, disturbed photographer George, takes special interest in her. Cheryl begins suspecting that a resident was murdered.

50.name: Prime Cut
50.description: A vicious Kansas City slaughterhouse owner and his hick family are having a bloody "beef" with the Chicago crime syndicate over profits from their joint illegal operations. Top enforcer Nick Devlin is sent to straighten things out.
